RESOURCE.NAME: Numbers Tagger
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Finds numbers in (both words and digits) and annotates them with their numeric value

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of annotation set used for the generated annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: failOnMissingInputAnnotations
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Throw an exception when there are none of the required input annotations (Token and Sentence)

PARAMETER.NAME: allowWithinWords
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Allow numbers to appear within words

PARAMETER.NAME: useHintsFromOriginalMarkups
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Use annotations from the Original markups as hints for annotating numbers

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: allowLowerCase
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Should lower case Roman numerals, e.g. vi, be recognised?

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name for annotation set used for the generated annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: maxTailLength
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The maximum numbers of characters allowed as a suffix. This is useful for recognising references to document parts that also have a sub-part, such as Table XIIa.

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process
